title: Trump lawyer Dershowitz called him corrupt in 2016 and said he could be corrupt as President
Trump unveils Middle East plan that caters to Israel
description: When President Donald Trump unveiled his administration's long-anticipated proposal to resolve the Israeli-Palestinian conflict at the White House on Tuesday, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu was at his side.

title: Jared Kushner: Palestinians have blown 'every opportunity they've had'
description: Senior White House adviser Jared Kushner made the case for President Donald Trump's Middle East plan Tuesday, praising the relationship his father-in-law has with Israel and admonishing Palestinians not to blow their "big opportunity."

title: Harvard professor among three charged with lying about Chinese government ties
description: A Harvard University professor and two other Chinese nationals were federally indicted in three separate cases for allegedly lying to the US about their involvement with China's government, the US attorney for the district of Massachusetts announced Tuesday.

title: Shaq speaks on Kobe's death for the first time
description: Shaquille O'Neal spoke out publicly for the first time since the passing of Kobe Bryant during the "The Big Podcast with Shaq."

title: Hottest-known exoplanet is so hot it rips apart its own molecules
description: KELT-9b is a giant exoplanet hotter than some stars, reaching 7,800 degrees Fahrenheit on its surface. Yet, it somehow has an atmosphere. But a new study using data from NASA's Spitzer Space Telescope has revealed that the molecules in its atmosphere are constantly ripped to pieces.

title: Huawei just dodged a bullet. A bigger one remains
description: Huawei has been granted a limited role in building Britain's 5G network, allowing the company to maintain its presence in a crucial market despite US efforts to rein in its growth.

title: Weinstein's and Cosby's trials are nearly identical. But there's 1 major difference
description: An older man once atop the world of entertainment hobbles into court to face sexual assault charges as his attorneys prepare to sharply attack the credibility of women who testify about their trauma.

title: Underdog sumo wrestler bursts into tears after remarkable win
description: Underdog victories don't come much bigger than this.

title: Selena Gomez accuses Justin Bieber of emotional abuse
description: In an interview with NPR, pop star Selena Gomez accused her ex, fellow pop star Justin Bieber, of being emotionally abusive. HLN and NPR have both reached out to Bieber's team and have not heard back.

title: Nairobi's 'chaotic' minibuses go high-tech
description: In Nairobi, Kenya, an informal network of vibrantly decorated minibuses -- known as matatus -- zigzags through the streets blaring out music and taking commuters to and from work.

title: Irina Shayk talks breakup with Bradley Cooper
description: Model Irina Shayk, who is known for being intensely private, has granted a rare interview in which she opened up about her personal life.

title: Avlon: Truth was in short supply at impeachment trial
description: CNN's John Avlon looks at President Trump's defense team strategy in his impeachment trial.

title: 37-year-old artist who tried to sketch everyone in New York dies
description: Artist and illustrator Jason Polan, who was working on an ambitious project to draw everyone in New York, died on Monday aged 37, his family confirmed to the New York Times.

title: Federer warned over expletive as he produces stunning comeback win
description: He said after the match that he believes in miracles, and Roger Federer needed exactly that to stay alive at the Australian Open.

title: Jimmy Fallon recalls first night he met Kobe Bryant
description: Late-night host Jimmy Fallon got emotional while paying tribute to his friend Kobe Bryant, who died in a helicopter accident on January 26.

title: How to stop hotel stays costing the Earth
description: For Sam Thompson, it was literally a watershed moment that came unexpectedly.

title: Hotel offers free stays for couples who make babies
description: For Valentine's Day this year, you could indulge in a cocktail-paired tasting menu at a top Vancouver restaurant, jet off to Whistler for a ski holiday or book a cozy lodge on the west coast of Vancouver Island to storm watch.

title: 'Go back to your country': Rugby star recalls racist abuse
description: It was the verbal insult that hit Maxime Mbanda the hardest, even after his car had been smashed and he was threatened with a crowbar.

title: Polyamorous relationships: When three isn't a crowd
description: Revelers in the rainbow-washed crowd smiled and cheered as the little blond girl in the parade float pageant-waved to the B-52's "Love Shack."

title: Death toll passes 100 as US health agency issues the highest of three levels of travel advisories it puts out
Japan travel agency faces 20,000 cancellations
description: The phone lines at Kamome, a Tokyo-based travel agency that specializes in tours for Chinese tourists, haven't stopped buzzing for the last three days.

title: Bryant's pilot got special clearance in worse-than-normal conditions

title: He was born to play basketball, but for Kobe Bryant that was never enough

Virus fears ripple through global markets
description: The Wuhan coronavirus is continuing to cause pain for investors.

title: Former production assistant to testify that Harvey Weinstein sexually assaulted her
description: Mimi Haleyi, a former production assistant who has said Harvey Weinstein forcibly performed oral sex on her in 2006 at his Manhattan apartment, will testify at his criminal trial on Monday, her attorney Gloria Allred told CNN.

title: Bombshells pressure Republicans to allow witnesses
description: • Analysis: 3 ways Bolton revelations undercut Trump's defense

title: How Hong Kong became a 'city of malls'
description: If people in Hong Kong want to see some provocative art this winter, they won't necessarily head to an art gallery or museum -- they'll go to the mall.

title: Hiker clinging to cliffside rescued by helicopter
description: A rescue helicopter saved a hiker who was hanging on to hillside tree roots after she fell from a nearby trail.

title: China cracks down on wildlife markets
description: In western markets, shoppers can buy beef, chicken, pork, and, if they're lucky, perhaps some duck or bison.

title: Why Trump's tweet may have waived his executive privilege
description: President Trump denied claims he told Bolton aid to Ukraine was tied to an investigation of the Bidens in a tweet, which CNN legal analyst Carrie Cordero says could affect President Trump's executive privilege defense.
